text: An image of a whimsical scene featuring a happy green frog. The frog is amusingly personified, wearing a pair of brightly colored swimming goggles, as if ready to take a dip in a pool. It finds itself in a human-like situation, perhaps sitting at a desk overflowing with papers and computer equipment, cup of coffee by its side, showing an expression of surprise and amusement. The background is a familiar office scene filled with subtle details like stationery items, potted plants and a window providing a glimpse of the outside world.
